snippet: The choreographer Zvi Gotheiner appropriated the dabke, a traditional Middle Eastern line dance, and gave it a modern interpretation in a world premiere in New York.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews world premiere of Zvi Gotheiner's dances Dabke and Coupling, performed by his company ZviDance, at New York Live Arts.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Zvi Gotheiner appropriated the dabke, a traditional Middle Eastern line dance, and gave it a modern interpretation in a world premiere in New York.

headline.seo: ZviDance in ‘Dabke’ and ‘Coupling’ at New York Live Arts
headline.main: A Line Dance Charged With Meaning
headline.print_headline: A Line Dance Charged With Meaning
